name: Devil Clutches - WebGL
description:
Free the lost souls from hell. Watch out for the demons and the evil souls.  

Devil Clutches is an entertaining arcade game. It is based on the game Evil Clutches, which was created in the book "The Game Maker's Apprentice". The game is currently under development (version 0.2) and includes Zen mode. Some extensions are planned, like the arcade mode, minigames, highscore, etc. 

I would be pleased about a feedback and extension wishes.
